"It's just the way you worded your statement. made it seem like she was of =
no value."

She wasn't. Oops!!! Did I say that??

;)


  ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
  From: threadsintyme@... 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
=
  Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 10:17 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Thanks,



=



  Sorry Frank,

  It's just the way you worded your statement. made it s=
eem like she was of no value. That's okay. I am certain that I read a bit m=
ore into what you wrote. Sorry! 

  I suspect that she may not have a lot g=
oing on in her life at the moment. Things are really tough up here in Michi=
gan. We have the worst economy in the US. There are also other reasons, I a=
m sure. But we may have all that she had going, you know. 

  Would like to=
 add, God Bless her and all that she does. 
  Al 
  ---------- Original Mes=
sage ----------
  From: Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@...>
  To: EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Thanks,
  Date: Mon, 8 Jun 2009 09=
:08:27 -0700 (PDT)



        What's not nice? I was telling April to not b=
other typing out a post because she was already gone. Why are ya'll reading=
 more into my posts then is there? I'm from Texas, friendly by nature! ;) L=
OL I haven't said a nasty thing to anyone this morning. 

        She unsub=
bed because she misunderstood what was going on and didn't wait around for =
an explanation. Maybe she has a thing for Carradine and all ya'lls poking f=
un in a few past posts got her angry...I don't know. 

        Regards,

  =
      Frank R.

        --- On Mon, 6/8/09, threadsintyme@... <Threads=
intyme@...> wrote:


          From: threadsintyme@... <Threadsin=
tyme@...>
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Thanks,
          To: EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups.com
          Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 11:02 AM


       =
   Frank,
          That's not nice...she unsubbed because she thinks that =
everyone was ignoring her. I wasn't. I have read everyone of her posts. 
  =
        Al

          From:=

om

od one! ;)

                Frank R.

                    I would have like to have be=
